projects.title: Flappy Bird - Android Game
projects.description:
A modern implementation of the classic Flappy Bird game developed for Android using Java. Features include:

• Custom physics engine for smooth bird movement

• Progressive difficulty scaling

• Local high score tracking

• Responsive touch controls

projects.title: GBC Travel - Trip Planning Platform
projects.description:
A comprehensive travel planning platform built for GBC students. Key features include:

• Interactive trip planning interface

• Real-time weather updates

• Collaborative itinerary creation

• Budget tracking and expense management

projects.title: FileDonutt - P2P File Sharing
projects.description:
A peer-to-peer file sharing platform powered by WebTorrent technology. Key features include:

• Direct file transfers without server storage

• Support for files up to 1TB

• Real-time transfer progress

• Secure end-to-end encryption

projects.title: LoFi Study - Music Player
projects.description:
A minimalist LoFi music player designed for productive study sessions. Features include:

• Curated LoFi music collection

• Customizable study timers

• Background noise mixing

• Focus mode with ambient lighting
